content.html: The wealth of UK billionaires is up by £106,500,000,000 in the pandemic. But instead of making them pay more, the Tories are raising National Insurance, hitting low paid & young workers the hardest. Social care should be funded with a wealth tax, not a tax on the working class.
content.value:
The wealth of UK billionaires is up by £106,500,000,000 in the pandemic.

But instead of making them pay more, the Tories are raising National Insurance, hitting low paid & young workers the hardest.

Social care should be funded with a wealth tax, not a tax on the working class.
